channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Pro-Level Photography with Anthropics
item.description: Your photos never looked this good
item.content:encoded: Get your cameras ready—it’s time to shoot some amazing photographs. Our latest bundle offers pro-level photography applications from the experts at Anthropics. This collection is perfect for seasoned professionals and novices looking to up their photography game. Focus on a variety of topics with stand-out classes like PortraitPro, LandscapePro, LandscapePro Studio, and more. Take your hobby to the next level and support the Save The Children Fund with your purchase!

item.title: Make Your Own Games In Unreal Engine 5 from GameDev.tv
item.content:encoded: Are you curious about turning your passion for gaming into a career in game development? Our latest bundle with GameDev.tv will help teach you how to use Unreal Engine 5 and get you started on an exciting new adventure. Master the universally beloved game engine with our comprehensive bundle composed of industry-leading courses like Unreal Engine 5 C++: Make Your Own Action Combat Game, Unreal Engine 5 Blueprints: First Person Shooter, and more! Start creating and help support Direct Relief with your purchase.

item.title: Royalty Free Music, SFX & More from GameDev Market 2025
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your next game with this bundle of professional quality sounds from GameDev Market! This massive library features over 40 hours of audio tracks and more than 6000 individual sound effects to bring your game to life. Craft exhilarating boss battle music with the Boss Battles & Combat Music, excite players with addicting loot tunes with the Game Music Treasury, and bring explosions and more to life with the Urban Destruction Demolition Debris & Explosions. Get the assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and help support Hilarity For Charity with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete Learn to Code Bundle 2025
item.description: Learn to code games like a pro
item.content:encoded: Achieve your New Year's resolution and learn to code! This comprehensive curriculum will help you level up your skills with courses like Unreal Engine 5.5 Game Developer's Toolbox - Essential Templates and Assets, Godot 4 Game Creator's Pack - Essential Templates for Instant Game Development, and many more. Our collection of 40+ courses includes Humble Bundle-exclusive content available only to our community. Familiarize yourself with popular tools like Python and Unreal Engine, all while supporting Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: The Game Dev Asset Mega Bundle: Unreal Engine & Unity
item.content:encoded:
Bring the worlds in your imagination to life in Unity and Unreal Engine with this mind-blowingly massive collection of environments, props, tools, and more! From sprawling cyberpunk dystopias to soul-stirring medieval villages, you’ll have the building blocks to create masterwork game environments that will transport your players. You’ll get over three dozen megapacks made up of modular assets that you can mix and match as you please, that utilize engine-native cutting-edge tools like Nanite and Lumen. Pay what you want for this indispensable toolkit and help support charity with your purchase.



Keys for this bundle are redeemed on either the Epic Games Store or Unity Asset Store, dependent on title.

item.title: Lonely Planet / uTalk Travel and Learn - New Year, New Language, New Destination
item.description: Explore the world as an informed traveler
item.content:encoded: Learn how to navigate far-off lands with grace and confidence using this bundle of books and courses from Lonely Planet and uTalk Travel! This comprehensive library will help you level up your skills in a variety of languages and will show you the best-kept secrets from around the world. Get hot Lonely Planet travel books like Lonely Planet Japan, Lonely Planet France, Lonely Planet Argentina, and more. Get the expert advice from professional travelers and the knowledge you seek, and help support the World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: GetRekt Best Stream Overlays of 2024
item.content:encoded: Dedicated to the streaming lifestyle? We knew it—upgrade your Twitch streams with this amazing overlay bundle from GetRekt today! Get a gigantic selection of customizable overlays like the Nano Black 3D Stream Overlays Package, Horror Stream Overlays Package, Stellar 3D Stream Overlays Package, and more! Take your live streams to the next level with personalized touches of style using these elite overlays. Plus, your purchase helps support Girls Who Code.

item.title: Vegas Pro 2024
item.description: Our best-selling Vegas Pro bundle is back!
item.content:encoded: Content creators, influencers, and other video savvy friends—we’ve curated the ultimate bundle for you. Get the Vegas Pro Bundle by MAGIX and take your video editing to the next level. You’ll get the renowned and easy to learn video editing package VEGAS Pro Edit 21, packed with sophisticated compositing features as well as integrated audio and effects. Also included is SOUND FORGE Pro 17, a powerhouse audio editing suite with extensive plugin support, designed to deliver flawless masters. Start using these, and other easy to learn video editing software today. Pay what you want for this astounding bundle and help Make A Wish with your purchase!
